Name: require_project_status_active
Description: Only consider projects with active status

Name: require_team_status_active
Description: Ensure only active teams are used

Name: require_feature_status_completed
Description: Only completed features contribute to goals

Name: require_user_story_status_done
Description: Only user stories with status 'done' are counted

Name: require_task_status_not_blocked
Description: Tasks must not be blocked by active blockers

Name: require_skill_certified
Description: Only certified skills are valid for assignment

Name: require_role_assigned
Description: Every worker must have at least one assigned role

Name: require_velocity_min_value
Description: Ensure minimum velocity is above zero

Name: require_daily_scrum_held
Description: Ensure daily scrum occurred on each sprint day

Name: require_sprint_goal_defined
Description: Every sprint must have a defined goal
